Text:
Why do some men like to fuck other men? Why do some women like to like and finger each other?

Easy. They are NOT SANE. PERIOD. What we have been dealing with all these centuries is NOT natural. Those that are queer...faggots...homosexuals are mentally ill. They are NOT sane. Yet somehow through our bastardized politically correct fucked up culture they have carved out a nitch in which they claim to be a sub section of REAL society. It's a fucking trajedy. People are so fucking mentally blind. Mentally blind people might should have their real eyes put out with hot nails. They can't see anyway...why let them keep their eyes when their mind is blind.

Anyway. Gay used to mean "happy". These mentally ill/retarded shit packers and pussy licking dikes have turned that word inside out and DESTROYED what was once a good word.
Never now can it be used to describe being happy without thinking of these mentally sick bastards and bitches that stole and raped that word from our language to describe their SICKNESS(mental).

If you do not agree. I'm sorry. You're wrong. I'm right. I deal in logical thought and conclusion. Facts not taken from context. Queers should be institutionalized and cured of their sickness. PERIOD. They deserve no extra rights. They deserve nothing. They deserve to be cured if possible and a lobotomy if not(IMO). 

Go ahead liberal socialist...talk to yourselves about my comment and how horrible it is and wrong I am. Just know this....I WON'T BE READING THIS PAGE AGAIN. You know why? THERE IS NO POINT ARGUING THE TRUTH TO A FOOL THAT SEES ONLY THE LIE. 

The Truth NEVER changes. 

Gd'day.
